identity.name: FounderReach
identity.archetype: Soft Utility (Clean functionality with human warmth)
visual_principles: Density with Breath: High data density in tables, but surrounded by generous whitespace.
Soft Borders: Use 1px borders in neutral grays instead of heavy shadows.
Status Visibility: Color-coded badges must be instantly recognizable.
Tactile Interactions: Subtle hover states that feel physical (border color shift).

tables.style: Clean, row-hover effect, minimal vertical dividers
tables.header_style: bg-slate-50 text-xs uppercase tracking-wider font-semibold text-slate-500

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-sm rounded-xl hover:border-slate-300 transition-colors duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-violet-700 hover:bg-violet-800 text-white shadow-sm rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-md px-3 py-2

badges.style: rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold ring-1 ring-inset ring-opacity-10

forms.input_style: h-10 rounded-md border border-slate-200 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-white file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-500 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-violet-500 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50
forms.label_style: text-sm font-medium leading-none peer-disabled:cursor-not-allowed peer-disabled:opacity-70 mb-2 block

modals.content: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-xl sm:rounded-lg max-w-lg

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px, Size 16-20px for UI, 24px for Nav

placeholders.tool_logo: Use a colored square container with the first letter of the tool name if no logo exists.

dashboard_page.guidance: Implement a high-density table for Outreach Records. Top section should have 3 key cards: 'Total Founders', 'Messages Sent', 'Reply Rate'. Use the 'Status' colors defined in palette. Add a 'New Outreach' button prominently.

tools_management.guidance: Grid of cards. Each card shows Tool Name, Description, and an 'Edit/Delete' action. Add a 'Add Tool' button top right.

founders_management.guidance: List view or Table view. Show Avatar, Name, Linked Tool, and Social URL. Include 'Import CSV' button if possible (UI only).

profiles_management.guidance: List of the 20 Facebook profiles. Show Profile Name, Status (Active/Restricted), and Last Used Date.

message_generation.guidance: A specialized modal. Left side: Select Template, Select Founder. Right side: Preview of the generated message with placeholders filled. Highlighting the replaced variables is a nice touch.

general: Ensure all interactive elements have hover states.
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds, stick to solid colors or very subtle mesh if absolutely necessary.
Add 'data-testid' to all buttons and inputs.
